performance_metrics.name: Scan Coverage (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of assets (IP addresses, hostnames, URLs) scanned within a specified timeframe.  Target achieved through adaptive scanning techniques and prioritizing high-risk assets.

performance_metrics.name: Vulnerability Detection Rate (Correctly Identified)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of actual vulnerabilities present on the target system accurately identified by the scanner. This is influenced by scanner configuration, vulnerability database accuracy, and asset configuration.

performance_metrics.name: False Positive Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of identified vulnerabilities that are not actual vulnerabilities. Optimized through configuration tuning and integration with threat intelligence feeds.

performance_metrics.name: Scan Time per Asset (Seconds)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken to scan a single asset.  Must remain within this range for large-scale deployments. Scaled by increasing scan concurrency.

performance_metrics.name: Concurrent Scan Threads
performance_metrics.description: Number of simultaneous scanning threads.  Scales with the number of assets and scanner processing power.

performance_metrics.name: Reporting Frequency
performance_metrics.description: Frequency of vulnerability reports generated. Real-time for immediate alerts; daily for comprehensive assessments.

performance_metrics.name: Report Generation Time
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to generate a full vulnerability report based on scan results.

implementation_requirements.name: Network Bandwidth Requirements
implementation_requirements.description: Sufficient network bandwidth to transmit scan data and receive scanner updates.  Scales linearly with the number of scanned assets.

implementation_requirements.name: Server Processing Power
implementation_requirements.specification: Minimum 8 Cores, 32 GB RAM, SSD Storage
implementation_requirements.description: Scanner server requirements.  Higher requirements for large-scale deployments or complex scanning profiles.

implementation_requirements.name: Scanner Agent Installation
implementation_requirements.specification: Automatic Agent Deployment via Group Policy/Configuration Management
implementation_requirements.description: Automated installation and management of scanner agents on target assets. Supports remote agent deployment and patching.

implementation_requirements.name: Integration with SIEM
implementation_requirements.specification: API-based Integration with Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) Systems
implementation_requirements.description: Real-time feed of vulnerability data into the organization’s SIEM system for centralized monitoring and correlation.

implementation_requirements.name: Vulnerability Database Maintenance
implementation_requirements.specification: Automatic Updates – Daily Updates, Manual Updates – Weekly
implementation_requirements.description: Regular updates to the vulnerability database to ensure accurate detection of known vulnerabilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Asset Discovery Accuracy
implementation_requirements.description: The scanning system must accurately identify and categorize all assets within the defined network scope.

operational_considerations: Regular Configuration Reviews:  At least quarterly reviews to ensure scanner configuration remains optimal.
False Positive Management: Establish a process for validating and eliminating false positives.
User Training: Provide training to IT and security staff on using and interpreting scanner reports.
Scanning Scheduling:  Schedule scans during off-peak hours to minimize impact on system performance.
Change Management: Implement a change management process for any modifications to scanning configurations or policies.
Scope Management: Regularly review and update the scan scope to include new assets and remove obsolete ones.
